## Feature Description
<!-- Clear and concise description of the feature -->
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

## Proposed Solution
<!-- Describe how you would like this feature to work -->
Describe the solution you'd like to see. Include:
- What should happen
- How it should work
- User benefits

## Alternative Solutions
<!-- Any alternative approaches you've considered -->
Have you considered any alternatives? Describe them here.

## Use Case
<!-- Explain why this feature would be useful -->
Who would benefit from this feature?
When would they use it?
How would it improve their experience?

## Examples
<!-- Provide examples or mockups if possible -->
- Similar features in other apps
- Screenshots or wireframes
- Code examples

## Implementation Considerations
<!-- Suggestions for implementation (optional) -->
- Affected files/modules
- Breaking changes?
- Performance implications
- Security considerations

## Additional Context
<!-- Any other context about the feature -->
- Frequency of use
- Priority level
- Related issues

## Checklist
- [ ] I've checked existing issues to avoid duplicates
- [ ] This feature aligns with the project scope
- [ ] I've provided clear use cases
- [ ] I'm willing to contribute this feature

## Label Suggestions
- `enhancement` - Feature request
- `priority-high` - Important feature
- `priority-low` - Nice to have
- `ui-ux` - UI/UX improvement
- `accessibility` - Accessibility feature
- `documentation` - Documentation improvement
